resources.string:
How to install a game

1. Connect the device to your computer with a USB cable.

2. On the device, tap the "Charging this device via USB" notification.

3. Under "Use USB for," select "File Transfer".

4. A file transfer window will open on your computer.

5. Copy the game folder (e.g. "Sengoku Rance") into Android/data/io.github.kichikuou.xsystem4/files/.

6. When you're done, disconnect the device from your computer.

7. Tap the menu button at the upper-right of this screen, and select "Refresh".
